class.name: Camera1D
class.description: Camera node for 1D scenes. It forces the screen to scroll following this node. This node uses Camera2D under the hood to do the heavy lifting.

members.member: If true, the 1D world will be displayed vertically instead of horizontally. This rotates the internal camera 90 degrees.
The thickness of the 1D scene in pixels. In reality 1D scenes have no thickness, but then they would not be visible, so having a thickness is required.
